column2: Do not try to invade the Valyrian Freehold…

column1: LOADING_TIP_9;Braavos is the weakest republic in the game, but has the potential to bceome the strongest.

column2: The Arbor/Oldtown feud will be bloody…

column1: LOADING_TIP_20;As Riverrun it is best to swear fealty to someone, or you may soon be destroyed.
